name: Jeremiah Grayson
description: Very little is known about Grayson, other than that he is a close associate ofAdam Smasher, doing all kinds ofmercenarywork forArasaka. As a gesture of appreciation for a particular job, Smasher gifted himJohnny Silverhand'sMalorian Arms 3516. In2077, Smasher assigned him to guard his shipping vessel, theDV Ebunike, which is moored at theNorthsidedocks. Aymeric Cassel, a classic car collector enthusiast, visited Night City in 2077 after Grayson offered thePorsche 911 Turboto him.Unfortunately for Aymeric, it was around that time whenVandRogue Amendiaresassaulted the docks to find information...
